column5: They had a web site last year that was very helpful. Does anybody know if they have a new site, or plan on opening it back up? Will be going there for my second time in 3 weeks, and it would be nice to see what changes there are this year. Ron
the new web site for mahkwa lodge is www.mahkwa.ca
Thats what I was looking for and couldn't find it using search engines. Thank you, Ron
